reviewText: Have no doubts on your mind. This is a porn movie.it shows almost every single sex act on camera with explicit scenes. This is not my point. I am talking about style of the porn movie. Recent decade porn movies became very fake and unrealistic in my opinion. This movie actually has a story line that follows thru the entire movie. Females do not have implants in every part of their body. I mean, movie is realistic. I will even go and say, this is a movie could be viewed with significant other as long as he or she enjoys porn with a story line and realistic people in it.

Wanted the movie because Mr. Landham is one of the stars, but after seeing it, found i injoyed all the movie.  Yes, there are some slow spots, but all in all a fairly good movie. Not for under 18, 'Don't care what they say!'

SYLVIA is a porn film with a very thin story.  Just like many other porn film in the market, it shows one sex sene after another.  The only different is Sonny Landhum.  Before he turned main stream, he was casted in several sex film.  He show his tool in "Abigail Leslie Is Back In Town", and that's it.  However, he had two sex scene in this film.  Both are hardcore and the audience could view the actor exposed himself in full glory,
and he even had money shot in the second scene.  Sonny Landhum did a excellent performance as a porno star(Yes, he is much better than Sylvester Stallone in ITALIAN SATLLONE) and apparently no body double is use in his those scene.  For those who admire Sonny Landhum's body, this file shouldn't be missed

Good suspense film but put the kids to bed!  The transfer from film to DVD is good.  This film is like some of the "Deranged Female" movies of the eighties except with the addition of explicit sex scenes!  Not a porn flick like the Stagg Film series but not as hard as Deep Throat either.  Suspense, Adult.

This is one of those films that amaze you just be their mere existence. Exploits the schizo stereotype and pop phenomenon of the SYBIL book and movie. Lead actress really makes it, She's pretty out there. There are some edgy scenes for sure, and some funny bits. Captures well the free love 60's sensibility that had crept into more middle class lifestyles. And the image quality is top notch, really looks fantastic.
